alert.note: Alert for Northern Coos (New Hampshire) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 28 at 3:16PM EST until March 01 at 5:00AM EST by NWS Gray/Portland
info.description: ...LOW PRESSURE TO BRING ACCUMULATING SNOW TO THE REGION THROUGH THIS EVENING... .An area of low pressure will exit the region tonight. Snow will taper off west to east before ending overnight. ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations between 1 and 3 inches for a storm total of 2 to 6 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Northern Coos County. * WHEN...Until 5 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Even light snowfall amounts can accumulate on roads and cause dangerous driving conditions due to snow covered roads. The hazardous conditions will impact this evening`s commute.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions can be obtained by going to newengland511.org
